text: Malay Film Productions Ltd., also known as Shaw Studio, was a movie studio on Jalan Ampas, Balestier, Singapore. It operated from 1947 to 1969 and produced over 150 movies, contributing to the "golden age" of Malay cinema. Many movies, including those by P. Ramlee as actor, director, writer, or composer, are highly acclaimed. However, many of these movies are now considered lost. ==References== Category:Movie studios Category:1943 establishments in Asia Category:History of Singapore
title: Malay Film Productions
